name: DevoseCare Dashboard
description: Internal management dashboard for DevoseCare center (Feb 02 – Feb 27, 2026). Responsible for: project & build configuration, role-based staff permissions, login/logout flow, Kanban appointment board with drag-and-drop (dnd-kit), customer list management, CMS module for controlling content displayed on the Client App, and overall UI/UX optimization.
impact: Delivered a full internal operations tool in under 4 weeks, enabling staff to manage appointments, customers and app content from a single interface

name: E-Commerce Platform (E-Shop)
description: Contributed to the storefront UI, optimized the cart and checkout flows, and improved page performance and UX to increase conversions.
impact: Reduced page load time by 40% and increased checkout conversion by 12%

name: Internal Admin Dashboard (AdminDash)
description: Built data management and reporting features including authentication and role-based access, enabling more reliable operations for the team.
impact: Saved ~20 hours/week for the operations team through automated reporting

name: Booking App (Bookly Mobile Web)
description: Designed and shipped the mobile web experience for bookings, optimized for slow networks and basic offline support.
impact: Increased mobile bookings by 2.3x within the first 6 months after launch
